pageContent: Background: Androgen deprivation therapy (ADT) has become the cornerstone of treatment for men with metastatic prostate cancer. However, treatments are associated with a number of adverse effects that collectively are referred to as andropause syndrome, or the male menopause.

metaData.source:
Breast and prostate MRI: new frontiers in women and men's imaging
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/18572719/
